0.text:
Innate - Accelerando: Sona generates a stack of Accelerando each time she hits an enemy with  Hymn of Valor or supports an ally with  Aria of Perseverance, which stacks up to 120 times. If she has maximum stacks, she instead  reduces the cooldown of  Crescendo by 1.5 seconds each time.
 Accelerando: For each stack, Sona gains  0.5 basic ability haste, up to a maximum of 60.

1.text: Innate - Melody: Sona's basic abilities incur  0.5-second global cooldown on her other basic abilities, and cause her to generate a unique aura for 3 seconds that empowers herself and nearby allied champions.

2.text: Innate - Power Chord: Sona's basic abilities generate a stack of Power Chord, which stacks up to 3 times. At 3 stacks, her next basic attack consumes them all to become empowered with an  uncancellable windup, deal 20 − 240 (based on level) (+ 20% AP) bonus magic damage, and apply an additional effect based on the last basic ability cast.

3.text: Gaining Power Chord's empowered attack  resets Sona's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Sona sends out bolts of sound to the two nearest visible enemies, prioritizing champions, that each deal magic damage and granting  sight of the area around them for 1 second. She gains a stack of  Accelerando for each bolt that hits an enemy  champion.

1.text: Melody Bonus: Sona and tagged allied champions deal bonus magic damage on their next basic attack within 5 seconds.

2.text: Power Chord – Staccato: Power Chord deals 28 − 336 (based on level) (+ 28% AP) total magic damage.

0.text: Active: Sona  heals herself and sends out a tone to heal the most wounded allied champion nearby.

1.text: Melody Bonus: Sona and tagged allied champions receive a  shield lasting up to 1.5 seconds.

2.text: Sona gains a stack of  Accelerando whenever she  heals a wounded ally or  shields a minimum amount of damage for an ally with Aria of Perseverance.

3.text: Power Chord – Diminuendo: Power Chord reduces the target's size by 8% and damage output by 25% (+ 4% per 100 AP) for 3 seconds.

0.text: Active: Sona gains 20% (+ 2% per 100 AP)  bonus movement speed for 3 seconds, which is extended to up to 7 seconds if she does not take damage during this time.

1.text: Melody Bonus: Tagged allied champions gain bonus movement speed for 3 seconds.

2.text: Power Chord – Tempo: Power Chord  slows the target by 40% (+ 4% per 100 AP) for 2 seconds, capped at a maximum of 99%.

0.text: Active: Sona strikes an irresistible chord in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit, which  stuns and forces them to dance for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.concerningText: Active: Sona sends out bolts of sound to the two nearest visible enemies, prioritizing champions, that each deal magic damage and granting  sight of the area around them for 1 second. She gains a stack of  Accelerando for each bolt that hits an enemy  champion.
Melody Bonus: Sona and tagged allied champions deal bonus magic damage on their next basic attack within 5 seconds.
Active: Sona  heals herself and sends out a tone to heal the most wounded allied champion nearby.

Active: Sona sends out bolts of sound to the two nearest visible enemies, prioritizing champions, that each deal magic damage and granting  sight of the area around them for 1 second. She gains a stack of  Accelerando for each bolt that hits an enemy  champion.
Melody Bonus: Sona and tagged allied champions deal bonus magic damage on their next basic attack within 5 seconds.

1.originHTML: +  650

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Keywords

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8 ability power
+10 health
+50% base mana regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Tribute: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging abilities and attacks against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants 20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Frostfang, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TRIBUTE: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging abilities and attacks against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants  20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

Keywords

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.
consume.originText: Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 ability power
+20 ability haste
+200 health
+100% base mana regeneration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Starlit Grace: When affecting champions with attacks or abilities in combat, heal the nearby allied champion (excluding yourself) with the most missing health for 60 (2 second cooldown).
Each second spent in combat with champions grants 5% heal and shield power, stacking up to 5 times for maximum of 25%.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 8 heal for this item's passive effect, Starlit Grace.
passive.originText:
UNIQUE – STARLIT GRACE: When affecting champions with attacks or abilities in combat,  heal the nearby allied champion (excluding yourself) with the most missing health for 60 (2 second cooldown).
Each second spent in combat with champions grants 5% heal and shield power, stacking up to 5 times for maximum of 25%.

1.originHTML: +  +  750

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • yuumi

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+60 ability power
+200 health
+500 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants ability haste equal to 0.5% bonus mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge and grants 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if it's a champion, up to a maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +360 mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – AWE: Grants ability haste equal to 0.5% bonus mana.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  550

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • aa

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+60 ability power
+20 ability haste
+100% base mana regeneration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Puffcap Toxin: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 25% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Healing or shielding allied champions (excluding yourself) empowers your and their next instance of damage against enemy champions within 5 seconds to apply 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – PUFFCAP TOXIN: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 25%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.  Healing or  shielding allied champions (excluding yourself) empowers your and their next instance of damage against enemy champions within 5 seconds to apply 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sanctify: Healing or shielding allied champions (excluding yourself) enhances you and them with 10% − 30% (based on target's level) bonus attack speed and 5 − 20 (based on target's level) bonus magic damage on-hit on basic attacks for 6 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SANCTIFY:  Healing or  shielding allied champions (excluding yourself) enhances you and them with 10% − 30% (based on target's level) bonus attack speed and 5 − 20 (based on target's level) bonus magic damage on-hit on basic attacks for 6 seconds.

Active: Sona sends out bolts of sound to the two nearest visible enemies, prioritizing champions, that each deal magic damage and granting  sight of the area around them for 1 second. She gains a stack of  Accelerando for each bolt that hits an enemy  champion.

1.concerningText: Melody Bonus: Sona and tagged allied champions deal bonus magic damage on their next basic attack within 5 seconds.

0.concerningText: Active: Sona  heals herself and sends out a tone to heal the most wounded allied champion nearby.

1.concerningText: Melody Bonus: Sona and tagged allied champions receive a  shield lasting up to 1.5 seconds.

0.concerningText: Melody Bonus: Tagged allied champions gain bonus movement speed for 3 seconds.
Active: Sona strikes an irresistible chord in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit, which  stuns and forces them to dance for 1.5 seconds.
